title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 16
description:
The first phase of Phaedrus' exploration of Quality with some classroom innovations. Also, the poem I mentioned is actually 2 poems. One by Wordsworth - Ode: Intimations of Immortality from Recollections of Early Childhood: https://poets.org/poem/ode-intimations-immortality-recollections-early-childhood
and the other by TS Eliot - Little Gidding: http://www.columbia.edu/itc/history/winter/w3206/edit/tseliotlittlegidding.html

Why I love JPB (before the politics, which I am ambivalent about) Ted Talk: https://youtu.be/tLteWutitFM - Lots of potential here for a Zamm commentary, right?
